quotes: At the 1996 Conservative Party Conference, Cameron called for tax cuts in the forthcoming Budget to be targeted at the low-paid and to 'small businesses where people took money out of their own pockets to put into companies to keep them going'.
In the round of selection contests taking place in the run-up to the 2001 general election, Cameron again attempted to be selected for a winnable seat.
He was in the final two but narrowly lost at Wealden in March 2000,
Cameron was selected as PPC for Witney in Oxfordshire in April 2000.
